department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Supply and delivery of a Solar Simulator
description: This project will provide a Solar Simulator to CanmetENERGY Devon (CE-D) for the Marine Conservation Targets project. The Simulator will be used to simulate summer solar activity in the Arctic for laboratory experiments.
duration_in_months: These values will be computed based on the utils functions
full_summary:
